sentences.sContent: If you test by the triangle's angles, possible types are right, acute, obtuse, or equiangular.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you test by the triangle's angles, possible types are right, acute, obtuse, or equiangular.
sentences.sCn: 如果您用三角形的角度进行测试，那么可能的类型是直角、锐角、钝角或等角三角形。

sentences.sContent: Microwave absorbing properties of the composites containing the planar equiangular spiral antenna arrays were investigated.
sentences.sContent_eng: Microwave absorbing properties of the composites containing the planar equiangular spiral antenna arrays were investigated.
sentences.sCn: 研究了含平面等角螺旋天线阵列吸波复合材料的微波吸收特性。
